title: Chain Knife
summaries: The Chain Knife is a pre-Hardmode flail that throws a knife-like projectile attached to a chain. It only extends a short distance of 12 tiles, though its quick use time and velocity may make it a good early to mid-game weapon. It has a 1/250 (0.4%) chance of being dropped by a Cave Bat.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
